name: v1_geocoding
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geocoding_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Convert city locations to latitude/longitude coordinates and vice versa. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/geocoding and https://api-ninjas.com/api/reversegeocoding.
API description: Fetches geolocation information of a specified city using the API Ninjas Geocoding API.

city.description: The name of the city to geocode.

country.description: The country name, 2-letter ISO country code, or 3-letter ISO country code.

state.description: The US state (for United States cities only).
